on reading compounds: 判【ハン】seal, stamp, monogram signature, judgment, judgement, size (of paper or books)

kun reading compounds: 分かる【わかる】to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow, to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out, I know!, I think so too!
